permissions: User must be an admin or a manager who is a member of the broker specified on the certification type.
validation_notes: Requires --name, --can-apply-to, and --broker. Name must be unique per broker. can-apply-to must be one of: Trucker, User, Customer. can-be-requirement-of values must be among: Job, CustomerTender, BrokerTender, JobProductionPlan, Project, Developer, Broker. requires-expiration must be boolean if provided.

flags.name: --can-apply-to
flags.description: Entity type this applies to (required, e.g., Trucker, User).
flags.validation: Must be one of: Trucker, User, Customer.

flags.name: --requires-expiration
flags.description: Whether certifications require an expiration date.

flags.name: --can-be-requirement-of
flags.description: Entity types this can be a requirement of (comma-separated).
flags.validation: Values must be among: Job, CustomerTender, BrokerTender, JobProductionPlan, Project, Developer, Broker.
